heading: The Logo
description: The Jollibee Group Foundation logo is composed of visual elements that represents the group's values, aspirations and purpose.

theHill.heading: The Hill
theHill.description: represents the challenging but surmountable uphill journey of community development.

theRisingSun.heading: The Rising Sun
theRisingSun.description: represents the vision for a brighter and happier future. Like the hope that springs from a new day, the sunrise also expresses Jollibee Group Foundation's mission to empower and uplift communities.

theStones.heading: The Stones
theStones.description: found on the hill serve as guides that lead to the path of positive change. The stones represent the values of the Jollibee Group: Customer Focus, Speed with Excellence, Humility to Listen and Learn, Spirit of Family and Fun, and Integrity.
